info.name: Lesson Planning API
info.description: Complete API collection for the Lesson Planning Application with JWT authentication and multi-tenant, multi-location support

exec: // Set common headers for all requests

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Can walk independently",
  "description": "Child can walk without support for at least 10 steps",
  "domain": "Physical",
  "ageRangeStart": 12,
  "ageRangeEnd": 18
}

{
  "name": "Building Blocks",
  "description": "Wooden building blocks for construction play",
  "category": "Toys",
  "quantity": 50,
  "location": "Toy Shelf A",
  "ageRangeStart": 24,
  "ageRangeEnd": 60
}

{
  "name": "Block Building Challenge",
  "description": "Children work together to build towers and structures",
  "objectives": ["Develop fine motor skills", "Encourage creativity", "Practice counting"],
  "materials": ["Building blocks", "Play mats"],
  "ageRangeStart": 24,
  "ageRangeEnd": 48,
  "duration": 30,
  "groupSize": 4
}

{
  "name": "Rainbow Room",
  "description": "Toddler classroom with play areas and learning centers",
  "locationId": "{{location_id}}",
  "capacity": 20,
  "ageRangeStart": 24,
  "ageRangeEnd": 48
}

item.name: Settings - Categories
item.description: Category management for activities, materials, and milestones (Admin only)

item.name: Settings - Age Groups
item.description: Age group definitions for developmental tracking (Admin only)
